entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:33 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Havre St-Pierre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:52 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -17.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Havre-Saint-Pierre Airport 3:47 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 76 %

Dewpoint: -20.4°C

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow squalls ending this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 60 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 29 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
